recipe_name: Rocket and goats' cheese salad with warm redcurrant dressing
author: Lesley Waters
method: For the salad, heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the goats' cheese for two minutes on each side, or until golden-brown. For the dressing, place all of the dressing ingredients into a saucepan and cook over a medium heat for 3-4 minutes. To serve, place the avocado and rocket onto a plate with the cheese on top and the warm dressing spooned over.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil ,  100g/3½oz firm goats' cheese ,  ½ avocado, sliced,  handful fresh rocket ,  75g/2¾oz redcurrants ,  2 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp balsamic vinegar,  1 tbsp brown sugar
